bangudesc:
la sutysisku is a fast dictionary for the Lojban language.

- Can I use it if I lose internet access?
- Yes, if this happens try opening this very address from this browser.
It should still open. A latest version of Chrome, Safari or Firefox is required.
  • Press / to focus the search field.
  • To search for rhymes: enter a word and type @ after it to find its rhymes sorted by relevance. klama@ is an example.
  • For advanced users: to enable regular expressions search in titles either start the string with ^ or end with $: ^mi, gau$ are examples.
For more resources visit Lojban-Chan.
else: Add as a search engine
title: Lojban dictionary la sutysisku
siskudescr: Search the Lojban dictionary la jbovlaste.
opdescr: Lojban dictionary: works offline (+ English and other languages)
